The Daily Telegraph first reported an email from Smiths manager Stan Martin was sent to 14 NRL clubs offering the Kiwi international provided the Storm secured commensurate compensation in return.

articles.author: Rich Cimini
articles.title: New York Jets fire defensive coordinator Gregg Williams after controversial blitz call - ESPN Australia
articles.description: Gregg Williams has been fired by the Jets, one day after the defensive coordinator's decision to call a Cover 0 blitz led to New York falling to 0-12 on the season.
articles.content: One day after his ill-advised, all-out blitz failed to take down the opposing quarterback on the game-deciding play, New York Jets defensive coordinator Gregg Williams was sacked by coach Adam Gase i… [+4308 chars]
